# Third-Party Licenses (v0.10.11)

## Runtime
- No additional third-party runtime extraction libraries are bundled in the extension code path.
- Core logic relies on browser Web APIs and local scripts in this repository.

## Build Tooling
- Vite and npm ecosystem tooling are used for local build/developer workflow.
- Licenses for build-time dependencies should be reviewed in `package-lock.json` and npm metadata before store submission.

## Font / Media
- No proprietary embedded font package is bundled for export pipeline.
- Exported assets are user-triggered and originate from user-visible chat content.

## Compliance Note
- If future dependencies are added, record package name, version, license type, and usage scope in this file.
